original_text: he took the seven loaves and the fish, and having given thanks he broke them and gave them to the disciples, and the disciples gave them to the crowds.
korean_text: 떡 일곱 개와 그 생선을 가지사 축사하시고 떼어 제자들에게 주시니 제자들이 무리에게 주매

sentences.original_text: he took the seven loaves and the fish
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 떡 일곱 개와 물고기를 가져왔습니다

sentences.original_text: and gave them to the disciples
and the disciples gave them to the crowds
